title: 如何平价拜登性侵丑闻？
contents:
A former neighbor of Joe Biden's accuser Tara Reade has come forward to corroborate her sexual-assault account, saying Reade discussed the allegations in detail in the mid-1990s


https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.businessinsider.com/former-neighbor-corroborates-joe-bidens-accuser-2020-4%3famp

民主党这是又一次挖了一个大坑给共和党跳，但是自己先进去了。民主党2020的总统还选吗？
